question:
Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music is essential to my life"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music is relatively unimportant"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I find great joy and fulfillment in listening to music"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music is boring to me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I find music soothing and it improves my mood"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I intensely enjoy music and listen to it frequently"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am not interested in music at all"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am not interested at all in music"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music is meaningless and pointless"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I find music completely uninspiring and irrelevant"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music does nothing for me and bores me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music is not that interesting"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music really moves me and can touch me emotionally"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music is irrelevant to me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I love music and need it as part of my life"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I dislike listening to music"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I generally dislike listening to music"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I have very little interest in any sort of music"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not care about music"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I enjoy listening to music every day"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I get enjoyment and/or satisfaction from my interest in music"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music can change my mood or my emotions"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I derive great pleasure and meaning from music"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music just isn’t that interesting to me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music is meaningless noise"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Nothing puts me in a great mood like listening to my favorite music"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music is just unpleasant noise"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not really care for music very much"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I listen to music every day and cannot imagine my life without music"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I listen to music practically every day, as music is very important to me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music is much more than just entertainment, it adds richness and meaning to my life"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I really love and enjoy music"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music is really not that big of a deal to me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I often enjoy listening to music or going to concerts"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I find calm and joy in listening to music"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I just don't see the appeal of music at all"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music is annoying"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"My emotions are deeply connected to music, and it expresses things I find hard to put into words"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am always listening to music and enjoy discovering new songs and artists"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music is central to my life and I cannot imagine living without it"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music is something that bores me and has never interested me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not see the point of listening to music"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Listening to music isn’t important to me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music is much more than songs with a good beat or catchy melodies; it is art because of the emotions and images it conveys"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music is just a nonessential time-waster that doesn’t matter in the grand scheme of things"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Listening to good music calms and revitalizes me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don't think music is important"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I have favorites songs that touch me on an emotional level"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not really care much for music"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Music isn't important"
